entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo Masks make things worse by giving people a false sense of security and causing  them to touch their face far more often to adjust it, etc. The least we can do is not be stupid like requiring nursing homes to take in patients with Covid19.
